subject: Execute System 3 Soul Audit & Persona Refinement
description: Run the automated System 3 audit to identify linguistic redundancies and optimize the Signal-to-Token ratio in voice.md and PROTOCOL.md.

history.summary: Executed System 3 audit, identified protocol drift (missing reflections) and verbosity issues. Applied patches to PROTOCOL.md and SYSTEM.md. Pushed feature branch task-20-system3-soul-audit.
